price: Nyankopͻn asiesie asotwee a εyε ya paa ato wͻn hͻ. Nokorε sε bͻne paa na wͻreyε no.
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum ʿadhāban shadīdan innahum sāa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
